name: Mixed Media Christmas Book
description:
The holidays are the perfect time to create with products that add sparkle and shine! We will be using my absolute favorite products from Viva Décor, Art Anthology and Ranger to produce a beautiful and unique 6x9 (and 3” thick!) chipboard book with boxy extensions that will flip out to the sides for even more interest and room! While incorporating mists, Distress stains, Inka Gold, a variety of shimmering texture mediums from Viva and Tim Holtz dies and stamps to embellish you will learn a plethora of mixed media techniques to create some fabulously festive effects to celebrate the holidays in an artistic way!

This kit will include all chipboard, pre-cut patterned and watercolor paper, plain and pre-embossed tags, LOTS of chipboard Christmas themed Tim Holtz die cuts to embellish, my favorite adhesive tape to constuct the base of the book, ribbon and very detailed instructions with pictures of everything and directions for each technique.  The instructions will be e-mailed to you once kit has shipped

NOTE:  if you do not have the exact products/colors that I used, no worries!  You can absolutely substitute with other things...this one is all about technique, color, sparkle and being creative - the possibilities are endless for this one with TONS of room to add so much more to it!

name: Beach canvas Flip Book
description:
*NOTE* This class has been retired and remaining kits are very limited!!
Photos, shells, sand and memories of a special beach excursion, cruise, island getaway or just some summer fun are the makings for a special keepsake! In this  mixed media canvas book you will learn some fun techniques that you will be able to carry on in to future projects as well.  The 8 inch square canvases will be “hinged” using a unique binding technique. The inside will utilize the negative space with dimensional elements hidden behind additional chipboard panels and pages that will flip out…this is one not to miss!!Kit comes with 2 8x8 canvas, buttons, nails, waxed linen, all pre-cut papers & chipboard and die cuts  plus sand, shells, sea glass, pebbles and other fun elements to complete the project.  You will need to provide your own stencils, stamps, adhesive and mists/paints.  Detailed color instructions will be e-mailed to you upon payment.

name: *NEW*  Artful Anthology Flip Book
description:
This is a fun and creative mixed media 8x8 chipboard mini-book that is sure to get your mojo going!  It has a unique trifold design with interactive flipping pages that give each section a gate book effect...and additional fun flipping elements inside!  You will be working with Art Anthology Colorations mists, sparkling Sorbet paints plus my own line of Dimensional Crystals to create gorgeous backgrounds and dimensional effects!

NOTE: Mists, paints, stamps and stencils are not included in the kit, however you can use any brand mists or paints you already have and choose your own favorite stencils to customize it...the techniques are the same...although there are some unique techniques specific to Art Anthology paints : ) 
Images in the center of the front cover will be pre-stamped in the kit.
(photos shown are just 2 different color combinations)

name: Texturized Cards
description:
Cards are not only fun to create but a great way to learn a variety of techniques on small and individual works of art! You will make 4 different 6x6” cards in this class focusing on elements that will add texture and interest….and of course we will be altering these items with lots of Ranger inks, stamps, embossing powders, mists and more!
If cards aren't your thing and you like to scrapbook, the techniques and designs you make could easily be incorporated in to a mini-book.  I promise I won’t be insulted : )

NOTE: You will need to provide your own inks however, I will include a small bag of Vertigris embossing powder, vintage glass glitter, pre-paint the fence with Distress Crackle Paint and pre-stamp all stamped images.

name: *NEW* Canvas Butterfly Pennant
description:
In this Creative workshop you will explore stunning mixed media techniques to create effects that sparkle and shimmer while you make a one of a kind 1x3 ft butterfly themed pennant for your wall!  You will be working with mists and my line of Dimensional Crystal paints from Art Anthology plus a variety of goodies from Viva Décor to add details.  Your finished project will be so full of dimension and texture that the butterflies will seem to come to life!

*NOTE: Mists and paints are not included in the kit, however I will pre stencil the part of the collage with the dots (Ferro from Viva Decor).  The word at the top can be created with any alphabet stamps, letter stencils, chipboard letters or cut something out of any die cutting machine!  A paintable adhesive such as gel medium, Mod Podge or Ranger's Multi-Medium works best for this project.  Detailed instructions will be e-mailed to you once kit it shipped

name: Image the Possibilities Mini-Book
description:
Take your creativity up a few notches with this little book that packs a punch with all of the techniques you will learn!
You will construct this chubby little mini-book from a Tim Holtz Die but we will be focusing on an easy stitched book binding technique and working with Distress Stains in a variety of ways. Plus we will mix in some Idea-ology embellishments, Sticky Back canvas, my favorite Basic Grey Paper, Tim’s stamps from Stamper’s Anonymous, Texture fades, fabric, Stickles and put it all together to make a fabulous little book ready for you to scrap or add your art journaling!
They say the best things come in small packages and this is no exception...the ideas and techniques in this class will have your mind imagining all of the things you will be able to create next!!

***Stamps and Distress Stains not included***

name: Life is Beautiful Gate Book
description:
In this class you will learn some creative mixed media techniques to help make your projects as beautiful as your life! We’ll be working with die cut elements from both Tim Holtz and Memory Box, Distress Inks (including the limited edition colors), Gesso, Crafter’s Workshop Templates from the fabulous Dyan Reavely and some of my favorite Glimmer Mist colors in this year’s Spring/Summer Limited editions that I designed for Tattered Angels…plus many more fun things will be incorporated throughout the book. This is an 8x9” chipboard gate book with flipping and folding interactive pages inside…SO much fun!! Focus will be on inky techniques and book construction.

**Mists, Stencils & Gesso Not Included**

name: Steampunk Montage
description:
No one develops product to create that vintage and steampunk effect better than Tim Holtz so we will be using lots of “Timspiration” to “Holtzify” this fun project (sorry, I couldn’t help it)!
In this class you will create a double 8x10” canvas panel wall hanging full of texture, inks, stamps, Idea-ology, Sizzix dies, UTEE, etc…but most of all we will focus on techniques!!

**Black Paint/Gesso, Distress Inks & Background Stamps Not Included**

**All Quotes will be pre-stamped with kit**
